title: [Good Omens] Sad Song (Animatic)
author: frey_sai
comment: Crowley’s half-heart on his jacket shatters in the bookshop scene and I’m not crying I’m fine

I-

I forgot how precious Crowley is with long hair
When Aziraphale tried to fly down to catch Crowley but couldn't, my heart fell with Crowley. This is so beautiful.
Crowley as Raphael is the headcanon I’m here for
They must be in love when is the wedding they need to get married
description:
contains the hc that Crowley was Raphael & Aziraphale's memory was wiped when Raphael fell. it has some flash imagery (lightning) so beware of that :)

the whole thing was so much fun to make i love ma boys :") 

ENJOY!!

song: Sad Song by We The Kings
programs used: paint tool SAI & adobe after effects
